text: Hey Iris, the CRM Extensions use custom JavaScript on HubSpot's side to display an iframe; not a browser window. That code to will close a separate browser window.

Hey team, chasing the API endpoint to bring back the number of contacts on a HubSpot account - I was using this call but it seems to be outdated
```<https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/contacts/statistics>```
